item.title: TGONext: Choose Architecture By Cons
item.author: contact@frost.tw (蒼時弦也)
item.description: This meetup we review previous discussions and switch to the next topic. Based on the high concurrency we talk about the last meetup, we simulate an architecture and evolution it.
